text: Aagaah raho! Aasman ke basney waley hon ya zameen ke , sab ke sab Allah ke mamlooq hain aur jo log Allah ke siwa kuch (apne khud saakhta) shareekon ko pukar rahey hain woh nirey weham o guman (conjectures and are merely guessing) ke pairo hain aur mehaz qayas aaraiyan (merely guessing) karte hain
